short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove single quotes from file name (related to issue with chrome 72)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: there was an issue with dynamics crm that the downloaded reports or attachment have a single quote in the beginning and end of its name, which change the extension of the file, this plugin will simply remove the single quote.
